item.title: Initial site improvements using Google's tools
item.description: I recently had my second experience of publishing a website. This time, it was for my wife’s clinic. Like this blog, I used hugo. Unlike this blog, I used cloudflare pages for the hosting. In this blog post, I’ll describe my initial steps improving the website with Google’s tools. Google Analytics I’m definitely not an expert of using Google Analytics, but I did know from the beginning that I would like to get basic analytics of my wife’s site.

item.title: Setting up a blog using Hugo and Github pages
item.description: In this first post, in an inception-like manner, I’ll share how I got this blog to work. Starting point This started with a Facebook group post which asked what is a good platform to host a blog. There were a few answers, but the hugo and github pages caught my eye, so I thought I’ll give it a go. I Googled a bit and found this guide. That was a good starting point, as it allowed me to get something to work - but I wasn’t fully happy with the end result.
